skins.shipDescription: Special type I Fubuki Destroyer Class― Fubuki
skins.selfIntroduction: Yoohoo~ I am the destroyer who recently made the world tremble, call me Fubuki! Sorry, I’m not trying to be complacent, in fact, I was in many battles… although none of them are worth writing home about… I will continue to do better!
skins.acquisition: Yoohoo~ yours truly Fubuki class has arrived, so you’re the Commander? I'm looking forward to your guidance~
skins.login: Commander, how are ya feeling today?~
skins.details: Hehe, are you that lonely Commander?~
skins.secretaryIdle1: The weather today sure is beautiful, don’t you think, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Listen up Inazuma, even if the Commander is a total loser, but I am totally (probably) reliable!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even if the Commander praises 100 times, that still won’t be too much... hmm, or perhaps 100 praises will be a bit tiresome to listen to.
skins.secretaryTouch: Help with work? O right… Looking at the Commander being so idle, I almost forgot about work~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wow! You scared me to death!

skins.shipDescription: Oh no! I-I'm gonna be late for school! Y-you need to speed up too, doggy! *Pant*... *pant*... Why'd none of my sisters wake me up before they left?!
skins.acquisition: Oh no! I-I'm gonna be late for school! Y-you need to speed up too, doggy! *Pant*... *pant*... Why'd none of my sisters wake me up before they left?!
skins.details: I didn't oversleep! I was just doing stuff I like and ended up losing track of time...
skins.secretaryIdle2: The Fencing Club, the Reading Society, the Economics Association, the UFO Research Organization... Dang it, I wanna join them all!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Belfast's going to hang out with Edinburgh after school... Maaan, I wish my sisters would come see me, too...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you got any more work you need help with? I've gotta go walk the doggy in 15 minutes!

skins.shipDescription: "C-come on in! We've got special offers for you!" ... W-wait, is this really what a "sexy mascot" would wear? It feels pretty different from what I was expecting... And boy, is it stuffy in this thing...
skins.acquisition: "C-come on in! We've got special offers for you!" ... W-wait, is this really what a "sexy mascot" would wear? It feels pretty different from what I was expecting... And boy, is it stuffy in this thing...
skins.login: C-come on in! ... Oops, I mean, welcome back, Commander!
skins.details: I-I feel my consciousness... flapping away...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I did promise Akashi I'd be the mascot... but it kind of feels like she tricked me...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Could you help me pick these up, Commander? Wearing this makes them... mmrgh... impossible to reach, you see...
skins.secretaryIdle3: What? The forecast warned about high temperatures? ... That's no biggie, I've already gotten used to it being really hot...
skins.secretaryTouch: C-Commander, don't touch me... I'm going to lose my balance...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wh-what? What the heck are you doing, Commander?

skins.shipDescription: Check it out, Commander! What do you think? ... No, not my dress! I'm talking about the tuba! Want me to play a tune for you~?
skins.acquisition: Check it out, Commander! What do you think? ... No, not my dress! I'm talking about the tuba! Want me to play a tune for you~?
skins.login: My marching solo will wake you up, Commander!
skins.details: Didn't think an instrument could be so fun! I have to teach others about the joy of music!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Let me play you a motivational song, Commander! Tooooot! ... Wh-what? That's annoying...? Sorry!
skins.secretaryIdle2: You should learn an instrument so we can play a song together, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh yeah, what do you think about my dress, Commander? Does it suit me? I absolutely adore it, it's all fluffy and stuff!
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you wanna hear a song, Commander? You got it! Manjuus, you all ready to go?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Whuah! ... Don't expect me to feel bad if I smack you with this thing, Commander!

skins.shipDescription: The whole world's going to feel the tremors from my debut! I'm Fubuki, the Special-type idol!

skins.JPClientName: ドタバタウェイトレス！
skins.shipDescription: Welcome, welcome! Oh, Commander! I've actually started working here part-time, but I'm still learning― Wooah?! Phew... Th-that was a close one...
skins.acquisition: Welcome, welcome! Oh, Commander! I've actually started working here part-time, but I'm still learning― Wooah?! Phew... Th-that was a close one...
skins.login: Commander... Err, I mean, welcome! What would you like to order~?
skins.details: If my sisters saw me working hard... would they say something like "Fubuki's such a hard-working role model?" Ehe... ehehe... Ah, I'm so so sorry, I just spaced out for a bit!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Sigh... When will I be able to handle this job as easily as Miss Belfast does?
skins.secretaryIdle2: You want to chat with me? Sure, as soon as I get finished with all this stuff... Ughh...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Did someone call for me? Excuse me, I'll be right there! Oh hey, it's Akatsuki and the others!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, this bell is just for decoration...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eep?! It's hard to keep my balance, so stop with that already!
